where.label: WR2
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY(rr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1') | rr.name < 'general tolerance definition')) = 0) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(rr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1') | (rr.name = 'general tolerance definition') AND (rr.rep_2.name < 'default tolerance'))) = 0) AND (SIZEOF(USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2')) = 0)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (SELF\externally_defined_item.item_id = 'external size dimension') AND (SELF\externally_defined_item.source.source_id = 'external size dimension specification')

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_MODEL' IN TYPEOF(rep_2)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_MODEL' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)))

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'MECHANICAL_DESIGN_GEOMETRIC_PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_2)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'MECHANICAL_DESIGN_GEOMETRIC_PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)))

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'MECHANICAL_DESIGN_SHADED_PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_2)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'MECHANICAL_DESIGN_SHADED_PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep_1)))

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(msb <* QUERY(it <* SELF.items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP' IN TYPEOF(it))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(csh <* msb_shells(msb) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(fcs <* csh\connected_face_set.cfs_faces | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ADVANCED_FACE' IN TYPEOF(fcs)))) = 0))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(msb <* QUERY(it <* items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.MANIFOLD_SOLID_BREP' IN TYPEOF(it))) | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ORIENTED_CLOSED_SHELL' IN TYPEOF(msb\manifold_solid_brep.outer)))) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(brv <* QUERY(it <* items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.BREP_WITH_VOIDS' IN TYPEOF(it))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(csh <* brv\brep_with_voids.voids | csh\oriented_closed_shell.orientation)) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR6
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(mi <* QUERY(it <* items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.MAPPED_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(it))) | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ADVANCED_BREP_SHAPE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(mi\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (SIZEOF(SELF.items) = 1) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* SELF.items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'COMPOUND_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(i)) AND (i.name = 'moments of inertia matrix'))) = 1)

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* SELF.items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'COMPOUND_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(i)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'LIST_REPRESENTATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(i\compound_representation_item.item_element)) AND value_range_aggregate_rep_item(i\compound_representation_item.item_element))) = 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.' + 'USED_REPRESENTATION') | pdr.name = 'contact ratio reference')) = 1) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.' + 'USED_REPRESENTATION') | (pdr.name = 'contact ratio reference') AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(pdr.definition)))) = 1)

where.label: WR3
where.expression: (SIZEOF(USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.' + 'USED_REPRESENTATION')) = 1) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION_REPRESENTATION.' + 'USED_REPRESENTATION') | SIZEOF(QUERY(gpa <* USEDIN(pdr.definition, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'GENERAL_PROPERTY_ASSOCIATION.' + 'DERIVED_DEFINITION') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'GENERAL_PROPERTY' IN TYPEOF(gpa.base_definition)) AND (gpa.base_definition.name = 'surface_condition'))) = 1)) = 1)

where.label: WR1

where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ci <* items | SIZEOF(QUERY(ata <* USEDIN(ci, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ATTRIBUTE_LANGUAGE_ASSIGNMENT.ITEMS') | (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.role.name = 'primary') AND (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.attribute_name = SELF\attribute_value_assignment.attribute_name) AND (ata\attribute_classification_assignment.assigned_class :=: translation_language))) > 0)) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(cd <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.CONFIGURATION_DESIGN.CONFIGURATION') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_DEFINITION_FORMATION' IN TYPEOF(cd.design)) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(prpc <* USEDIN(cd.design\product_definition_formation.of_product, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRODUCT_RELATED_PRODUCT_CATEGORY.PRODUCTS') | prpc.name IN ['part', 'raw material', 'tool'])) > 0))) <= 1

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CONFIGURABLE_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) XOR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_SPECIFICATION' IN TYPEOF(SELF))

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* SELF.items | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(i)) OR NOT (i\product_definition.frame_of_reference.name IN ['conceptual definition', 'part occurrence', 'functional definition', 'alternative definition']))) = 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: (SELF.role.name <> 'design') OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* SELF.items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(i)) AND (i\product_definition.frame_of_reference.name = 'part occurrence'))) = 0)

where.label: WR6
where.expression: (SELF.role.name <> 'usage') OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* SELF.items | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRODUCT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF(i)) AND (i\product_definition.frame_of_reference.name = 'conceptual definition'))) = 0)

where.label: WR2

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(cfr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CONCEPT_FEATURE_RELATIONSHIP.' + 'RELATING_PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CONCEPT_FEATURE_RELATIONSHIP_WITH_CONDITION' IN TYPEOF(cfr)) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(ipcf <* USEDIN(cfr, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CONDITIONAL_CONCEPT_FEATURE.' + 'CONDITION') | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'INCLUSION_PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF(ipcf))) = 1))) > 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(aga <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'GROUP_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_GROUP') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'APPLIED_GROUP_ASSIGNMENT' IN TYPEOF(aga)) AND ((aga.role.name <> 'specification category member') OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(i <* | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PRODUCT_CONCEPT_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF(i)) AND NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CONDITIONAL_CONCEPT_FEATURE' IN TYPEOF(i)))) <> SIZEOF(aga))))) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF.role.name IN ['mandatory category usage', 'optional category usage']

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SELF.name IN ['blanked arrow', 'blanked box', 'blanked dot', 'blanked triangle', 'dimension origin', 'filled arrow', 'filled box', 'filled dot', 'integral symbol', 'open arrow', 'slash', 'unfilled arrow', 'unfilled triangle', 'filled triangle']

where.label: WR3
where.expression: (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PLANAR_BOX' IN TYPEOF(SELF\styled_item.item)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'CURVE_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\styled_item.styles[1]\presentation_style_assignment.styles[1]))) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PLANE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\styled_item.item)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'FILL_AREA_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(SELF\styled_item.styles[1]\presentation_style_assignment.styles[1])))

entity.name: draughting_callout
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(datum_feature_callout, datum_target_callout, dimension_curve_directed_callout, draughting_elements, geometrical_tolerance_callout, leader_directed_callout, projection_directed_callout, structured_dimension_callout) ANDOR (surface_condition_callout)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY(l_1 <* SELF\draughting_callout.contents | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.LEADER_CURVE' IN (TYPEOF(l_1)))) = 0) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.LEADER_DIRECTED_CALLOUT' IN (TYPEOF(SELF))) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(l_1 <* SELF\draughting_callout.contents | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PROJECTION_CURVE' IN (TYPEOF(l_1)))) = 0) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PROJECTION_DIRECTED_CALLOUT' IN (TYPEOF(SELF))) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(l_1 <* SELF\draughting_callout.contents | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.DIMENSION_CURVE' IN (TYPEOF(l_1)))) = 0) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.DIMENSION_CURVE_DIRECTED_CALLOUT' IN (TYPEOF(SELF)))

where.label: WR3
where.expression: (SIZEOF(QUERY(dct1 <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'TERMINATOR_SYMBOL.ANNOTATED_CURVE') | (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CURVE_TERMINATOR' IN TYPEOF(dct1)) AND (dct1\dimension_curve_terminator.role = origin)))) <= 1) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(dct2 <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'TERMINATOR_SYMBOL.ANNOTATED_CURVE') | (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CURVE_TERMINATOR' IN TYPEOF(dct2)) AND (dct2\dimension_curve_terminator.role = target)))) <= 1)

where.label: WR1

where.label: WR2

where.label: WR3

where.label: WR4
where.expression: (NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF))) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | NOT ((SIZEOF(sty.styles) = 1) AND (SIZEOF(TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]) * ['AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.SYMBOL_STYLE', 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.NULL_STYLE']) = 1)))) = 0)

where.label: WR5
where.expression: (NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item)))) OR (SIZEOF(['AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_SYMBOL_REPRESENTATION', 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_SUBFIGURE_REPRESENTATION'] * TYPEOF(SELF.item\mapped_item.mapping_source.mapped_representation)) = 1)

where.label: WR6

where.label: WR8
where.expression: (NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.COMPOSITE_TEXT' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item)))) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(tl <* SELF.item\composite_text.collected_text | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.TEXT_LITERAL' IN TYPEOF(tl)))) = 0)

where.label: WR9

where.label: WR10

where.label: WR11

where.label: WR12
where.expression: NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.COMPOSITE_TEXT' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item))) OR check_text_font(SELF.item)

where.label: WR13
where.expression: (NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.COMPOSITE_TEXT' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item)))) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(tl <* QUERY(text <* SELF.item\composite_text.collected_text | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.TEXT_LITERAL' IN TYPEOF(text))) | NOT (SIZEOF(TYPEOF(tl) * ['AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'TEXT_LITERAL_WITH_BLANKING_BOX', 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'TEXT_LITERAL_WITH_ASSOCIATED_CURVES']) = 0))) = 0)

where.label: WR14
where.expression: (NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.TEXT_LITERAL_WITH_ASSOCIATED_CURVES' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item)))) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(crv <* SELF.item\text_literal_with_associated_curves.associated_curves | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(si <* USEDIN(crv, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.STYLED_ITEM.ITEM') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_CURVE_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(si)))) > 0))) = 0)

where.label: WR15
where.expression: (NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.COMPOSITE_TEXT_WITH_ASSOCIATED_CURVES' IN TYPEOF(SELF.item)))) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(crv <* SELF.item\composite_text_with_associated_curves.associated_curves | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(si <* USEDIN(crv, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.STYLED_ITEM.ITEM') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_CURVE_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(si)))) > 0))) = 0)

where.label: WR16
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(cs <* QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.CURVE_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]))) | NOT (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.LENGTH_MEASURE_WITH_UNIT' IN TYPEOF(cs.styles[1]\curve_style.curve_width)) AND ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.POSITIVE_LENGTH_MEASURE' IN TYPEOF(cs.styles[1]\curve_style.curve_width\measure_with_unit.value_component))))) = 0

where.label: WR17
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(fas <* QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.FILL_AREA_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]))) | NOT ((SIZEOF(QUERY(fs <* fas.styles[1]\fill_area_style.fill_styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.FILL_AREA_STYLE_TILES' IN TYPEOF(fs)))) <= 1) AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(fst <* QUERY(fs <* fas.styles[1]\fill_area_style.fill_styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.FILL_AREA_STYLE_TILES' IN TYPEOF(fs))) | NOT (SIZEOF(fst\fill_area_style_tiles.tiles) = 1))) = 0)))) = 0

where.label: WR18
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(fas <* QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.FILL_AREA_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(fsh <* QUERY(fs <* fas.styles[1]\fill_area_style.fill_styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.FILL_AREA_STYLE_HATCHING' IN TYPEOF(fs))) | NOT (fsh\fill_area_style_hatching.point_of_reference_hatch_line :=: fsh\fill_area_style_hatching.pattern_start))) = 0))) = 0

where.label: WR19
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ts <* QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.TEXT_STYLE' IN TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]))) | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'TEXT_STYLE_WITH_BOX_CHARACTERISTICS' IN TYPEOF(ts.styles[1])))) = 0

where.label: WR20
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ts <* QUERY(sty <* SELF.styles | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.TEXT_STYLE_WITH_BOX_CHARACTERISTICS' IN TYPEOF(sty.styles[1]))) | NOT (SIZEOF(ts.styles[1]\text_style_with_box_characteristics.characteristics) = 4))) = 0

where.label: WR3
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(srm <* QUERY(rm <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_MAP.MAPPED_REPRESENTATION') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.SYMBOL_REPRESENTATION_MAP' IN TYPEOF(rm))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(a_s <* QUERY(mi <* srm.map_usage | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL' IN TYPEOF(mi))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(aso <* USEDIN(a_s, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'STYLED_ITEM.ITEM') | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SUBFIGURE_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(aso)))) = 0))) = 0))) > 0

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(srm <* QUERY(rm <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_MAP.MAPPED_REPRESENTATION') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.SYMBOL_REPRESENTATION_MAP' IN TYPEOF(rm))) | (SIZEOF(QUERY(a_s <* QUERY(mi <* srm.map_usage | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL' IN TYPEOF(mi))) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(aso <* USEDIN(a_s, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'STYLED_ITEM.ITEM') | NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_SYMBOL_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(aso)))) = 0))) = 0))) > 0

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ((SELF.name = 'prefix') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.related_draughting_callout.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | NOT (ato.name = 'prefix text'))) = 0))

where.label: WR6
where.expression: ((SELF.name = 'suffix') AND (SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.related_draughting_callout.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | NOT (ato.name = 'suffix text'))) = 0))

where.label: WR1

where.expression: NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.DIMENSION_CURVE_DIRECTED_CALLOUT' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(con <* SELF.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PROJECTION_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(con)))) <= 2)

where.label: WR5
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(sec <* QUERY(rc <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT_' + 'RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CALLOUT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF(rc)) AND (rc.name = 'secondary')) | NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(prim <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT_' + 'RELATIONSHIP.RELATING_DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CALLOUT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF(prim)) AND (prim.name = 'primary'))) = 1))) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | NOT (ato.name IN ['dimension value', 'tolerance value', 'unit text', 'prefix text', 'suffix text']))) = 0

where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | (ato.name = 'dimension value'))) >= 1

where.label: WR6
where.expression: NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | (ato.name = 'prefix text'))) > 0) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(dcr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT_RELATIONSHIP.' + 'RELATING_DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CALLOUT_COMPONENT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF(dcr)) AND (dcr.name = 'prefix'))) = 1)

where.label: WR7
where.expression: NOT (SIZEOF(QUERY(ato <* QUERY(con <* SELF.contents | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ANNOTATION_TEXT_OCCURRENCE' IN TYPEOF(con))) | (ato.name = 'suffix text'))) > 0) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(dcr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT_RELATIONSHIP.' + 'RELATING_DRAUGHTING_CALLOUT') | ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'DIMENSION_CALLOUT_COMPONENT_RELATIONSHIP' IN TYPEOF(dcr)) AND (dcr.name = 'suffix'))) = 1)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (NOT ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.CURVE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve))) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.CIRCLE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve)) OR ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.ELLIPSE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.B_SPLINE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve)) AND (closed_curve\b_spline_curve.closed_curve = TRUE)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.COMPOSITE_CURVE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve)) AND (closed_curve\composite_curve.closed_curve = TRUE)) OR (('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.POLYLINE' IN TYPEOF(closed_curve)) AND (closed_curve\polyline.points[LOINDEX(closed_curve\polyline.points)] = closed_curve\polyline.points[HIINDEX(closed_curve\polyline.points)]))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(style1 <* SELF.styles | SIZEOF(QUERY(style2 <* SELF.styles - style1 | TYPEOF(style1) = TYPEOF(style2))) > 0)) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: ('AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRESENTATION_AREA' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(prr <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2') | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(prr\representation_relationship.rep_1))) > 0) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(rm <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_MAP.' + 'MAPPED_REPRESENTATION') | SIZEOF(QUERY(mi <* USEDIN(rm, 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'MAPPED_ITEM.' + 'MAPPING_SOURCE') | SIZEOF(QUERY(rep <* using_representations(mi) | 'AP209_MULTIDISCIPLINARY_ANALYSIS_AND_DESIGN_MIM.' + 'PRESENTATION_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(rep))) > 0)) > 0)) > 0)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pdr <* | (pdr = 'solution alternative definition') AND (NOT (pdr IN ['alternative definition', 'functional definition', 'conceptual definition']) OR (pdr <> 'alternative definition')))) = 0

entity.name: bounded_curve
entity.super.expression: ONEOF(polyline, b_spline_curve, trimmed_curve, bounded_pcurve, bounded_surface_curve, composite_curve)

entity.name: solid_with_depression
entity.super.expression: solid_with_through_depression ANDOR ONEOF(solid_with_hole, solid_with_pocket, solid_with_slot, solid_with_groove)
